short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import cv from all Linkedin with just a click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CV to ATS express is a productivity tool that helps to further make hiring process and creation on candidates applications easier. In sync with the ALLIBO ATS management system, you can add, candidate from LinkedIn straight to your account.
long.it: CV to ATS express is a productivity tool that helps to further make hiring process and creation on candidates applications easier. In sync with the ALLIBO ATS management system, you can add, candidate from linkedin straight to your account.
